Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: Are there any blockers? The docs are not updated, and it would be good to include some of the improvements in the pipeline.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: If FAB-4002 is going to be merged it should be in beta.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: Think fab-4097 should be merged before we cut beta

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: All Highest bugs should be addressed if possible.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: Do we include (and therefore wait for) Jason's changes related to: FAB-1678?

Action.author: jonathanlevi
Action.body: I think we should wait for all of ~jyellick 's FAB-1678 sub-tasks that are in review... other than the documentation ones.

Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: a task to vet Getting Started for content and links ?

Action.author: jonathanlevi
Action.body: ~muralisr , most certainly, thanks. Here we go: https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-4237

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: I'm re-branding this for alpha3 since we are not ready for beta just yet. Will create a new JIRA for beta and move some of the relevant blockers over to the new JIRA issue.
